org.eclipse.jgit.lib

クラス RefWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jgit.lib.RefWriter

  • public abstract class RefWriter
extends Object
    Writes out refs to the Constants.INFO_REFS and Constants.PACKED_REFS files. This class is abstract as the writing of the files must be handled by the caller. This is because it is used by transport classes as well.

    • コンストラクタのサマリー

      コンストラクタ 
      コンストラクタと説明
      RefWriter(Collection<Ref> refs) 
      RefWriter(Map<String,Ref> refs) 
      RefWriter(RefList<Ref> refs)

      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明

      Handles actual writing of ref files to the git repository, which may differ slightly depending on the destination and transport.

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • RefWriter

        public RefWriter(Collection<Ref> refs)
        パラメータ:
        refs - the complete set of references. This should have been computed by applying updates to the advertised refs already discovered.

      • RefWriter

        public RefWriter(Map<String,Ref> refs)
        パラメータ:
        refs - the complete set of references. This should have been computed by applying updates to the advertised refs already discovered.

      • RefWriter

        public RefWriter(RefList<Ref> refs)
        パラメータ:
        refs - the complete set of references. This should have been computed by applying updates to the advertised refs already discovered.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • writeInfoRefs

        public void writeInfoRefs()
                   throws IOException
        Rebuild the Constants.INFO_REFS.

        This method rebuilds the contents of the Constants.INFO_REFS file to match the passed list of references.

        例外:
        IOException - writing is not supported, or attempting to write the file failed, possibly due to permissions or remote disk full, etc.

      • writePackedRefs

        public void writePackedRefs()
                     throws IOException
        Rebuild the Constants.PACKED_REFS file.

        This method rebuilds the contents of the Constants.PACKED_REFS file to match the passed list of references, including only those refs that have a storage type of Ref.Storage.PACKED.

        例外:
        IOException - writing is not supported, or attempting to write the file failed, possibly due to permissions or remote disk full, etc.

      • writeFile

        protected abstract void writeFile(String file,
                                  byte[] content)
                           throws IOException
        Handles actual writing of ref files to the git repository, which may differ slightly depending on the destination and transport.
        パラメータ:
        file - path to ref file.
        content - byte content of file to be written.
        例外:
        IOException
